sentences: Ta jättis oma vähke kodus ja läks tööle.
Kui sa vähkelähe peale aitad, siis see on vaba.
context: The Estonian word 'vähk' primarily translates to 'crab'. It can also refer to other crustaceans like crawfish or lobster depending on the context. It is commonly used in everyday conversation when talking about seafood or cooking.
